Does it always run the best? No, are the updates on point all the time? Not really, not going to lie at the face value this game doesn't really seem the best. But, if you stick with it like the community and dev team has, you realize that within the confines of the rage-inducing rounds there is a solid strategy game here. Don't get me wrong, DBD is infuriating as all hell but at the end of the day there isn't much better of a feeling than successfully running the killer for 5 gens. Get this game if you want a totally new experience to grow and get better at, dodge it if you're looking for a "casual" game to play. Might want to check out fall guys or something.

It's undoubtedly a good concept and a good game. You'll find a lot of reviews with thousands of hours but still saying no and this is the same. I love this game, I really do, but the management and development is terrible. They break integral parts of the game every few patches and leave them broken, ignore important balancing issues that the community is crying out for so they can change graphics from something the community already likes to something they often don't. 
It's a good game but its constantly bugged and lacks the finish any game this long in development should, frankly it gets less polished every few patches and they don't listen to the community.

Bugs, bugs, muitos bugs. Pode-se dizer que esse é um bug com gameplay, porém não existe nada melhor que este no mercado é divertido com muitas possibilidades de se jogar, diversos perks diferentes pra fazer a sua build, killers unicos e arte incrivel, se tiver amigos então melhor ainda T_T. Porém se for comprar tenha ciência de que o jogo tem muitos bugs e a cada update a lista aumenta, o balanceamento de perks do jogo é questionavel no minimo.

I wish I got this game sooner! I absolutely love how simple the design of it is but the amount of content you have many years later is definitely worth it! It's not a perfect game, I feel like the blood web and how effective some items (for survivors) and some add ons (for killers) are a little weird in terms of their design. Also there should be a practice range (that is not just the tutorial) for the killers especially so that you can practice the abilities without going into the crazy game. But I like how they reward long play with better perks and stuff so even though you might not be the best at the game you can fit it to the playstyle you like. Best part is how fast matches can go so if you just want a quick game to spice up a break you can go to 2 to 3 matches and that would last around 30-40 mins. Great game! I hope they continue to support it and I hope you reading this will buy it!

Tenho este jogo a muito tempo e recentemente tenho problemas com a fila do jogo, porque se você for sobrevivente demora MUITO pra achar um grupo, uma vez que ninguém quer jogar de Killer [eu jogo pouco de killer mas sempre que coloco, carrega muito rápido]

English
I have sanctified DBD and it always played with a lot of fun but I can no longer recommend it to anyone, if you are new now you are first overwhelmed with the heaps of perks and killer skills. It was deteriorated by so many updates if you imagine that every 3 months new killers reinkommen how should the game then look in 3 years since it will no longer play because it no longer makes fun.

Deutsch;
Ich habe DBD geheiligt und es immer mit sehr viel spaß gespielt aber ich kann es keinem mehr empfehlen, wenn man jetzt  neu ist  ist man erstmal überfordert mit den haufen perks und killer fähigkeiten. Es wurde durch so viele updates verschlechtert wenn man sich vorstellt das alle 3 monate neue Killer reinkommen wie soll das game dann in 3 jahren aussehen da wird es keiner mehr zocken weil es kein Fun mehr macht.

An sich nices Game, aber das Matchmaking ist echt mies. Man wartet häufiger VIELE Minuten auf eine Lobby. Dann gibt es noch viele doofe Mitspieler/Killer, die einfach nur auf Points aus sind. 
Viel DLC-Kram, fühle mich hier wie bei EA.

Хорошая игра, чтоб побомбить с того, что чел снимает тебя с крюка во время того, как убийца стоит рядом или с того, что лечит прям посреди поля. Прикольно, когда остаешься один живой и бегаешь чинишь генераторы под присмотром убийцы, еще классно, что хоть где-то меня носят на ручках, ахах. Нраица покупать всяких персонажей, которые дополнительные, мне они кажутся более уместными, чем те, что есть априори. Очень здорово, рекомендую.
с норм пати выжить почти сложно но можно

Best game I've played in a long time - truly innovative game play. They managed to successfully bring stealth to competitive multiplayer in a very polished way. And the tone and vibe is simultaneously gruesome but somehow... kind of funny? After playing the game enough you get past the horror of it too (which is really well done and you will probably pee yourself your first 20 or so rounds as survivor) so it kind of stops being a "horror" game which is actually kind of nice. I feel like a lot of horror games trade on the shock and horror of the subject matter at the expense of game play - this game definitely does not. It brings all the shock and horror, but the game play is absolutely front and center. 

Can't recommend enough.
ёбанная помойка  но я буду продолжать потому что игра класная

Pareamento de jogadores EXTREMAMENTE quebrado. Iniciante pega VÁRIOS jogos contra jogadores Rank 1-4 .... vc só vai perder seu tempo e passar raiva. COMUNIDADE EXTREMAMENTE TÓXICA. Esse jogo é muito injusto com novos jogadores, é impossível se divertir contra jogadores experientes que só vão rir da sua cara.

Я знаю, что вы это увидите. Мне не важно кто вы, чем занимаетесь, чем интересуетесь... Я просто хочу, чтобы вы это увидели. Прочитав мой комментарий, задумайтесь - довольны ли вы своей жизнью; не встретили ли дурную компанию, не свернули ли вы в ложном направлении? Хотите ли вы что-то поменять? Или же вы собираетесь терпеть это всё, попивая чай без сахара по скидке за старым компьютером в "Хрущовке"? Подумайте над этим... А так игра стоит своих денег <3
